Deep in the ocean, Ollie the Octopus loved collecting shiny objects. One day, Ollie found the most beautiful shell he had ever seen. 
As he admired it, he noticed a small crab crying nearby. The crab explained that the shell was his lost home. 
Feeling empathetic, Ollie decided to return the shell to the crab. The crab was overjoyed and thanked Ollie for his kindness. 
In return, the crab gave Ollie a special pearl. Ollie learned that helping others brought him more happiness than any shiny object ever could.
